import React from "react"; import "./App.css"; import "./MovieCard.css"; import '../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function MovieCard({movie}) { return (
{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

  • {movie.genres}
Movie link {movie.release_date}
); } export default MovieCard; /*

{movie.release} {movie.genre}
